item.title: Layout
item.description: Layout # The standard directory layout # By default, a Maven project is expected to comply with the so-called “standard directly layout”. Warning. We focus here on files and folders that you are likely to use in your project. A more comprehensive description can be found here. ├── README.md ├── pom.xml ├── src │ ├── main │ │ ├── java │ │ │ └── ... │ │ └── resources │ │ └── .
